department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Research Methods in Pre-modern Chinese Literature--Proseminar
course.description: An introduction to the use of Western and East Asian sources in literary research, including both print and digital media. In addition, one hour each week will be devoted to a basic text in literary theory.
course.notes: Primarily for first- and second-year graduate students (MA or PhD).
